description: In PowerShell, this command may be an alias of Invoke-WebRequest when the original curl program (https://curl.se) is not properly installed. More information: https://learn.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/invoke-webrequest.

useCases.description: View documentation for the original curl command:
View documentation for PowerShell's Invoke-WebRequest command:
Check whether curl is properly installed by printing its version number. If this command evaluates into an error, PowerShell may have substituted this command with Invoke-WebRequest:
